DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics Orally Administered GCC4401C Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective study investigate safety tolerability follow administration single ascend dos GCC4401C healthy male subject ; secondary objective study characterize single-dose PK profile oral administration GCC-4401C , determine appropriate dose range dose regimen oral GCC-4401C subsequent clinical trial .
